flextable 0.9.7
  • Function reference
  • User Documentation

Delete flextable content

Source: R/empty.R
void.Rd

Set content display as a blank " ".

Usage

void(x, j = NULL, part = "body")

Arguments

x

flextable object

j

columns selection

part

partname of the table

Examples

ftab <- flextable(head(mtcars))
ftab <- void(ftab, ~ vs + am + gear + carb)
ftab

mpg
cyl
disp
hp
drat
wt
